column4: my compac laptop got no sound after i installed ubuntu... pls can someone help a total ubuntu beginner ;)
what sort of internal specs do you have?
how can i see that?
I don't know.
But I can find out
ok...
Run " sudo lshw -html >> info.html " in the terminal
ok i try that
hmm if i run the "sudo" command it asks for my password... i dont know what that can be!?!? and if i run "firefox" commans i get a blank side
It's your system asking for authentication, to make sure you're who you say you are.
And you have to run the info command first
well... i dont know what password that should be....
You put it in when you installed ubuntu
the same as i using when logg in?
Yes
that are numbers and i cant press any numbers in the terminal window!!!???
You can't... input numbers in the terminal!?
i tried again now but i only end up at prompt...
i think this might not be for me... all this about programming and things isnt what im used to ;)
now i got a page with my internal specs....
What sort of sound controller does that have?
82801I (ICH9 Family) HD Audio Controller
